title: Do I deserve where I am or should I be higher?
body:
Dont get me wrong, I am where I am for a reason, I started at bronze 2, every game I played with my friend (SerXyfrusLeSmurf) we would usually lose because he would sometimes put people on tilt by being rude, going dorans ring on supports and intentionally kill stealing. (He also started at bronze 2, we lost 7/10 of our games, and he is now bronze 5)

Ive slowly climbed up the ladder playing solo, and when im solo I have a pretty good win rate with most of my heros (Minus riven holy shit i ranked I crashed and burned with her lol)

So where do you tihnk I belong? heres my profile link(s):
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=serkenji
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/1555327

I'm fine with where I am and how im progressing, I'm not saying I *deserve* gold or anything just interested in friendly opinions.

replies.body: Looking at your games I can see that your KDA is not particularly high on any of your mains, however your win rate is. The main things that I noticed while looking at your stats is that you seem to be dying to often for your kill participation and that you have low cs. Just work on these things and you should be fine and who knows where you will get :)

Your MMR is average of Silver 5.

Meaning yes, that's where you belong.






> For now.

Akali is really good at chasing people down, Katarina is really good at team fighting if she gets in at the right time. 
Decide Katarina or Akali based on the enemy champions.

Team disengage bot lane?
Ezreal/Janna
Akali

Not as good gap closing champions?
Kogmaw/Varus - Katarina

They have a %%%% tonne of CC? 
Akali is probably safer than Kat, because Kats entire ult is canceled by 1 cc ability.

you are where you should be

im not saying you are bad, im just saying you are where you should be.

keep winning and you will keep moving up.

Your cs is pretty weak (158 by 40 as a mid (your Kat game notwithstanding)), but it would seem you're killing the opponents frequently. My magical prediction skills tell me you're going to land somewhere in Silver 3.
The way to know you're in your deserved place is when you have a W/L ratio of 1 over 40+ games in the same division/league/whatever.

As I mentoned in my other reply, I agree.
I am terrible at CS at the moment because I dont even really think about it, not from the start to mid game anyway, I'm just trying to get kils
Well my W/L% is getting pretty good and I'm on a rnaked winning streak at the moment so im hoping I can continue it.

Best tip I can give you to rank up that most pros would tell you the same thing. Focus on your individual play and play with your team. You can't win them all. If someone flames you cause you have died a few times, don't react cause that's what they want you to do cause clearly they don't care about ranking up. Keep to yourself but help as a team mate. If someone makes a bad call to go in and it doesn't go well, then see it as a bad call is better then no call at all. Look for your mistakes in you gameplay and try to progress it in the next.

Yeah, I really try to avoid being negative, it never helps.
Of course being human, sometimes I cant help myself when someone last picks AP rek top, but alas, I must take the good with the bad.

Your KDA, While you have a lot of Kills, you still also have a lot of deaths. You also play a lot of heavy snowballing champs like Kat and Akali which means your team relies on you to do a lot in teamfights. I cant really say what you are doing is right or wrong, but i would suggest trying to minimise deaths and to focus more on towers and CS than playing TDM, although you are playing assassins which means u are good at killing.

If you start to snowball your lead, you should try to roam and snowball your team instead of facestomping your lane opponent.

Silver is were the Average player is meant to be, so dont worry about being bad, like your B5 friend, but id say if you are silver, you should be able to get to Gold with practice on the games mechanics.

Thanks for the reply.
I do tend to forget about CS, and just try and kill everyone on most of my champs (Asssassins, mostly).
Which is good and bad I guess, at the moment its working but I know I do need to work on my CS.
I just hit Silver today so Im pretty happy with that.
